official_title: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to provide that the penalty for failure of employers to file certain reports with respect to the Medicare and Medicaid Coverage Data Bank shall apply only with respect to reports required in calendar years beginning after 90 days after necessary regulations are promulgated.

summary.text: Amends title XI of the Social Security Act to delay the penalty for failure of employers to file certain reports with respect to the Medicare and Medicaid Coverage Data Bank.

titles.title: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to provide that the penalty for failure of employers to file certain reports with respect to the Medicare and Medicaid Coverage Data Bank shall apply only with respect to reports required in calendar years beginning after 90 days after necessary regulations are promulgated.
